title: Tall and skinny
content:
I’m looking for a typeface similiar to Trade Gothic Condensed but taller. Does anyone have suggestions for a san serif font that is extra condensed which I’m hoping will give the appearance of “tall and skinny”? Thanks...

 [‹ InDesign Black Output on PDF Export](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/typophile.com/node/31345 "Go to previous forum topic") [Searching for HalAgenda ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/typophile.com/node/35935 "Go to next forum topic")
author: baskervillebold

comments.content:
Related to Trade Gothic:  
 [Alternate Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/alternate_gothic_virtual/)  
 [Alpin Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/cg_alpin_gothic/)

More narrow sans serifs:  
 [Antenna Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/antenna_compressed/)  
 [Stainless Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/stainless_compressed/)  
 [FF Clan Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_clan_ot_compressed/)  
 [FF DIN Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_din_condensed_ot/)  
 [Agency Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/agency_compressed/)  
 [Amplitude Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/amplitude_1_compressed/)  
 [Titling Gothic Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/titling_gothic_compressed/) and [Titling Gothic Skyline](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/titling_gothic_skyline/)

[Impact alternatives](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/extra-bold-ultra-black-fonts#impact) (more compact and heavy than skinny)

The skinniest of them all: [Barcode](http://web.archive.org/web/20070831193754/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/barcode/)
